model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Hey neighbor, how's it going?
Not bad, thanks. How about you?
Oh, I'm doing alright. I was just thinking about the old days when I had my rock band.
Really? You had a band?
Yeah, we were called "The Neighbors A Band." We used to play live shows around the city.
That's awesome! What kind of music did you guys play?
We played rock music, mostly covers but we also wrote some of our own songs.
Have you ever thought about starting the band again?
Not really, it was just a fun hobby back then. Plus, I don't think I have the same energy as I did when I was younger.
That's understandable. Do you still play any instruments?
I have a guitar but I haven't played it in a while. Maybe I should start practicing again.
Yeah, that sounds like a good idea. Maybe you could even teach me a thing or two.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'cooking mishap', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A burns the roast and discusses feeling out of control.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors A: I can't believe I burned the roast! It was supposed to be a special dinner. ### Neighbors B: It's okay. We all make mistakes in the kitchen. You can always try again. ### Neighbors A: I know, but I just got so angry. I hate feeling so out of control. ### Neighbors B: Have you tried any anger management techniques? Maybe deep breathing or meditation? ### Neighbors A: No, I haven't. But that's a good idea. I'll look into it. ### Neighbors B: Remember the time when you moved to London? You were so stressed out, but you were able to handle it well. ### Neighbors A: Yeah, I did have to learn how to manage my stress during that time. Maybe those techniques can help with my anger too. ### Neighbors B: Exactly! And hey, if all else fails, we can always order takeout for dinner tonight.' }
```
